mapper.select: select landmarkinfo_id, landmarkinfo_name from landmarkinfo where landmarkinfo_name like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
select trip_id, trip_title, trip_content from trip where trip_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or trip_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
select bbs_id, bbs_title, bbs_content from bbs where bbs_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or bbs_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
select trip_img, trip_title, trip_id from trip order by trip_total_like desc limit 4
select introducestore_img, introducestore_title, introducestore_id from introducestore order by introducestore_like desc limit 4
select bbs_title, bbs_id, bbs_total_like from bbs order by bbs_total_like desc limit 5

select trip_id, trip_title, trip_content from (select row_number() over(order by trip_id) as row_no, c.* from trip c where trip_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or trip_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') )c2 where c2.row_no between ${start} and ${end}

select bbs_id, bbs_title, bbs_content from (select row_number() over(order by bbs_id) as row_no, c.* from bbs c where bbs_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or bbs_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') )c2 where c2.row_no between ${start} and ${end}
select count(*) as 'count' from landmarkinfo where landmarkinfo_name like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
select count(*) from trip where trip_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or trip_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
select count(*) from bbs where bbs_title like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%') or bbs_content like CONCAT('%',#{searching},'%')
